Question.Subject: How do i save my recordings on X Factor Pure Solo site?
Question.Content: Every time i record a track it sont let me save my song, what is wrong? Everything is working, microphone, sound everything, can anyone help?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Hey, why don't you ask your question on the site's forum? There's a trouble shooting section where you can post and their team will help you there: http://xfactorkaraoke.puresolo.com/forums

Answer.Content: Hey, why don't you ask your question on the site's forum? There's a trouble shooting section where you can post and their team will help you there: http://xfactorkaraoke.puresolo.com/forums
